verses.verse: And <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> in <S%G3321>heaven,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G239>Alleluia;<s%> <S%G4991>Salvation,<s%> and <S%G1391>glory,<s%> and <S%G5092>honor,<s%> and <S%G1411>power,<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> our <S%G2316>God:<s%>

For <S%G228>true<s%> and <S%G1342>righteous<s%> are his <S%G2920>judgments:<s%> for he has <S%G2919>judged<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4204>whore,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> did <S%G5351>corrupt<s%> the <S%G1093>earth<s%> with her <S%G4202>fornication,<s%> and has <S%G1556>avenged<s%> the <S%G129>blood<s%> of his <S%G1401>servants<s%> <S%G1537>at<s%> her <S%G5495>hand.<s%>
And <S%G1208>again<s%> they <S%G2046>said,<s%> Alleluia <S%G239><s%>And her <S%G2586>smoke<s%> <S%G305>rose<s%> up for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%>

And the <S%G5064>four<s%> and <S%G1501>twenty<s%> <S%G4245>elders<s%> and the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G2226>beasts<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> down and <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G281>Amen;<s%> <S%G239>Alleluia.<s%>

And a <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1881>came<s%> out of the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G134>Praise<s%> our <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> you his <S%G1401>servants,<s%> and you that <S%G5399>fear<s%> him, both <S%G3398>small<s%> and <S%G3173>great.<s%>

And I <S%G191>heard<s%> as it were the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and as the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5204>waters,<s%> and as the <S%G5456>voice<s%> of <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G1027>thunder,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G239>Alleluia:<s%> for the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3841>omnipotent<s%> <S%G936>reigns.<s%>

Let us be <S%G5463>glad<s%> and <S%G21>rejoice,<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G1391>honor<s%> to him: for the <S%G1062>marriage<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb<s%> is <S%G2064>come,<s%> and his <S%G1135>wife<s%> has <S%G2090>made<s%> <S%G1438>herself<s%> <S%G2090>ready.<s%>

And to her was <S%G1325>granted<s%> that she should be <S%G4016>arrayed<s%> in fine <S%G1039>linen,<s%> <S%G2513>clean<s%> and <S%G2986>white:<s%> for the fine <S%G1039>linen<s%> is the <S%G1345>righteousness<s%> of <S%G40>saints.<s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G1125>Write,<s%> <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> are they which are <S%G2564>called<s%> to the <S%G1062>marriage<s%> <S%G1173>supper<s%> of the <S%G721>Lamb.<s%> And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G3778>These<s%> are the <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G3056>sayings<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And I <S%G4098>fell<s%> <S%G1715>at<s%> his <S%G4228>feet<s%> to <S%G4352>worship<s%> him. And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to me, <S%G3700>See<s%> you do it not: I <S%G1510>am<s%> your fellow <S%G4889>servant,<s%> and of your <S%G80>brothers<s%> that <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%> <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God:<s%> for the <S%G3141>testimony<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> is the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4394>prophecy.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G3321>heaven<s%> <S%G455>opened,<s%> and <S%G2400>behold<s%> a <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2462>horse;<s%> and he that <S%G2521>sat<s%> on him was <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4103>Faithful<s%> and <S%G228>True,<s%> and in <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> he does <S%G2919>judge<s%> and <S%G4170>make<s%> <S%G4170>war.<s%>

His <S%G3788>eyes<s%> were as a <S%G5395>flame<s%> of <S%G4442>fire,<s%> and <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> were <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1238>crowns;<s%> and he <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> that <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1492>knew,<s%> but he himself.
And he was <S%G4016>clothed<s%> with a <S%G2440>clothing<s%> <S%G911>dipped<s%> in <S%G129>blood:<s%> and his <S%G3686>name<s%> is <S%G2564>called<s%> The <S%G3056>Word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And the <S%G4753>armies<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> were in <S%G3321>heaven<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him on <S%G3022>white<s%> <S%G2462>horses,<s%> <S%G1746>clothed<s%> in fine <S%G1039>linen,<s%> <S%G3022>white<s%> and <S%G2513>clean.<s%>

And out of his <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1607>goes<s%> a <S%G3691>sharp<s%> <S%G4501>sword,<s%> that with it he should <S%G3960>smite<s%> the <S%G1484>nations:<s%> and he shall <S%G4165>rule<s%> them with a <S%G4464>rod<s%> of <S%G4603>iron:<s%> and he <S%G3961>treads<s%> the wine <S%G3025>press<s%> <S%G3631><s%> of the <S%G2372>fierceness<s%> and <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G3841>Almighty<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And he <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G2440>clothing<s%> and <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G3382>thigh<s%> a <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G935>KING<s%> OF <S%G935>KINGS,<s%> AND <S%G2962>LORD<s%> OF <S%G2962>LORDS.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> an <S%G32>angel<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> in the <S%G2246>sun;<s%> and he <S%G2896>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3732>fowls<s%> that <S%G4072>fly<s%> in the <S%G3321>middle<s%> of <S%G3321>heaven,<s%> <S%G1205>Come<s%> and <S%G4863>gather<s%> yourselves <S%G4863>together<s%> to the <S%G1173>supper<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%>

That you may <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G935>kings,<s%> and the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G5506>captains,<s%> and the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G2478>mighty<s%> men, and the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G2462>horses,<s%> and of them that <S%G2521>sit<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> them, and the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> men, <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%> and <S%G1401>bond,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3398>small<s%> and <S%G3173>great.<s%>

And I <S%G1492>saw<s%> the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> and the <S%G935>kings<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> and their <S%G4753>armies,<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G4171>war<s%> <S%G3326>against<s%> him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2462>horse,<s%> and <S%G3326>against<s%> his <S%G4753>army.<s%>

And the <S%G2342>beast<s%> was <S%G4084>taken,<s%> and with him the <S%G5578>false<s%> <S%G5578>prophet<s%> that <S%G4160>worked<s%> <S%G4592>miracles<s%> <S%G1799>before<s%> him, with <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4105>deceived<s%> them that had <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> and them that <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> his <S%G1504>image.<s%> <S%G3588>These<s%> <S%G1417>both<s%> were <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3041>lake<s%> of <S%G4442>fire<s%> <S%G2545>burning<s%> with <S%G2303>brimstone.<s%>

And the <S%G3062>remnant<s%> were <S%G615>slain<s%> with the <S%G4501>sword<s%> of him that <S%G2521>sat<s%> on the <S%G2462>horse,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> sword <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> out of his <S%G4750>mouth:<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3732>fowls<s%> were <S%G5526>filled<s%> with their <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>
